ygData.subject: One More Thing
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a little bug in the login system, so if you made a character without editing it after creation, can you please edit your chars and just click submit?

I found a little bug in the login system, so if you made a character
without editing it after creation, can you please edit your chars and
just click submit? Thanx.

G'night y'all.
